name: Heed the Racemaster
description:
Heed the Racemaster is a 2D road-like (racing roguelike) where players participate in death races, salvage the parts of their opponents, and customize their vehicles with the scrap. In this wasteland run by the figure only known as the Racemaster, people from across the wasteland gather their best scrap and race for the chance to participate in the ULTIMATE DEATH RACE!!!

Created By:

Devon Hawley

Christian Hotte
